website_summaries.verdict: A cost-effective laser receiver with a loud beep; suitable for multiple leveling tasks.
pros: Designed to resist some weather conditions

customer_reviews.title: Very handy tool
customer_reviews.text: I used it with a Johnson rotary laser ($127.00 model) and it worked excellent. I was using it about 30 feet from the laser and it was picking up the signal perfectly even though I couldn't see the laser in the daylight. My only complaint would be that it is too loud and the volume dosen't go low enough. After a while it becomes very annoying so I wound up just turning the sound off. If it had a better volume control I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Oyler

customer_reviews.title: excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one to replace a dewalt receiver that gave up on me. this one works about the same although I've only used it once or twice. it gives you a choice of sensitivity to the width of the signal but there isn't much difference. price was very reasonable compared to a lot of the sensors listed. the only potential problem I noticed is that it didn't seem to have the range of the dewalt. It doesn't make sense because the laser should be what determines the range but I did seem to have a little trouble getting it to hit the farther I got from the laser. but like I said, I've only used it a couple times.
customer_reviews.author: Huntsabunch

customer_reviews.title: I like the unit but it is backwards to all other ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the unit but it is backwards to all other targets we've used in 25 years. When you are using the unit, when the grade is low, this unit beeps FAST....all other targets will beep SLOW.....and it's the opposite when the grade is high.....this unit beeps SLOW when all other units beep fast...so this unit is backwards to all other targets we've used in the past. Other than that, it's a nice unit, load beeps, easy to read display and nice easy to use unit
customer_reviews.author: Charles Scott Reese

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Very good value. A rotateing laser is not much good in the daylight without a receiver. This unit works nicely. I returned my Johnson brand receiver after being disappointed in its quality and accuracy. This receiver is better in every aspect. Tougher build quality, better clamp, built in levels, two sided displays, loudness settings, and magnet built in. I would recommend this as it makes using a rotating laser level a very useful tool.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Hirsch

customer_reviews.title: Good level works well with other lasers
customer_reviews.text: I dig pools for a living and the guys use these to level the forms with our desalt lasers . They never break but the guys throw them around . So they do break .
customer_reviews.author: michael moreno

customer_reviews.title: Not what i thought
customer_reviews.text: My johnson rotory laser wouldnt work with it, we t to harbor freight and theirs looked identical, so finally broke down and bought a whole bosch kit, it will pick up the bosch laser so ill have 2 receivers.The bosch reciever will also pickup the johnson laser, my opinion spend the extra and buy a bosch
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Crose

customer_reviews.title: Works well with Harbor Freight rotary laser
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use with an inexpensive Harbor freight rotary laser. The rotary laser cannot be used in full sunlight without a rotary laser receiver because the laser is too weak. Adding this receiver allows me to use the rotary laser in direct sunlight. I read another review that said this receiver does not indicate when on level, only when high or low. That is not the case. When on level it gives a constant tone. It beeps long or short beeps when high or low.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Not good with red laser Bosch.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work with my Bosch. Go out in daylight and could not find the laser line at all. Bought one from Bosch LR2 and it works amazingly well. Outside no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Handyman

customer_reviews.title: It’s better then the one came with my lesser kit
customer_reviews.text: I bought the lesser kit on ebay for about $350 after 2 months of light use the the handle of the lesser broke of and couldn’t find handle replacement bc the lesser was China make and bought this, this not just work better but the handle and lesser it’s large and high quality
customer_reviews.author: Fatbardh

customer_reviews.title: but outside it was useless as the beam just was invisible
customer_reviews.text: I had an inexpensive rotary laser level for YEARS, but outside it was useless as the beam just was invisible. For the money, this thing is better than sliced bread, and faithfully does what MUCH more expensive laser receivers do at a fraction of the cost What's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Bobinyelm

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Compatible with Dewalt
customer_reviews.text: Just as described! I bought this for my husband to use with his dewalt rotary laser. The original one that came with it broke. Instead of buying a whole new one, I got this to see if it would work. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I was looking for a receiver for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I was looking for a receiver for my laser level and had read reviews on one that was twice the amount. So glad I took a chance and bought this one. I have been an excavator pipelayer for years and used High end units. But for just around home this unit surprised me on how far I could move from the laser level and it still picked up and was quite accurate. For any do it yourself home improvement I full recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I paired this with an older rotary laser I had that the target unit had failed. I've only used it on one project (so far) and the accuracy is impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Coslett

customer_reviews.title: It’s backwards
customer_reviews.text: Ugg, should have went deeper into the reviews. It works well but the beeps are backwards and crew won’t use it. Oh well it’s a good back up I guess till I get a different one
customer_reviews.author: JUSTIN C.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not the best, not the worst. Bought one that was used but in new condition and it broke on day one. The brand new receiver worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Cronin

customer_reviews.title: only works for 10 feet
customer_reviews.text: We were hopeful it would work for our new building project, but the lack of distance made this not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Sommers Ward

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use, easy to operate.
customer_reviews.text: I do like the fine and course adjustment, great for grading outdoors for paver work on the starting grade in the dirt . Finer sensor for laying pavers afterward. You will need to keep an eye on the clamp as it may slip if you bang the story pole into the ground looking for the grade.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Santobuono

customer_reviews.title: Worked once them died.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit because my dewalt receiver died. When got it i tried it inside a few inches from the laser and it worked fine. the next day when I had a job. It would power up but would'nt detect the lazer .
customer_reviews.author: John Kidd

customer_reviews.title: very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This laser receiver works perfect even in bright sunlight at a good distance away it still picks up the laser beam
customer_reviews.author: raymond schofield

customer_reviews.title: Arrived intact, in good packing and powered up immediately.
customer_reviews.text: Need some grades measured around the property, and this should be a big help, with the Huepar laser level.
customer_reviews.author: T. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Quick setup,accuracy, and ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: It works very well with the laser level and makes your work much easier not having to have someone else to help with the leveling process.
customer_reviews.author: D. Walker

customer_reviews.title: I could not get it to function.
customer_reviews.text: The unit powered up OK, but would not respond to my laser. I discovered that it was designed to work with rotary lasers and not line lasers. Once I tried using it with my rotary laser it worked great. Yes, I recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased four of these. They do not work well. I returned all of them. They worked for about an hour and then something happen and they would pick up 2’ below the actual red rotary laser line.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good . Works well. The only thing I could say is that on every other receiver I have ever used , the fast beep means down and the slow up. This one is backwards. The fast beep means up and the slow down, other than that i am impressed, especially considering the price point of this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Greg L.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant to buy but works better than the original
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Seems to have much too wide a range for accurate measuring by tone. It covered a half inch easily at 25 feet. Especially bad when the laser is too weak to see and you are using the tone.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Works fine with my Johnson laser level
customer_reviews.text: Works fine as a replacement for my Johnson laser unit that died. Much less expensive than the Johnson replacement and both made in China anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Plumb

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: We have a problem with our operators leaving the receivers on the ground and then they just disappear! We have found that the AdIrPro LD-8 is a less expensive way to replace these lost receivers, and our personnel like the fact that the cost is approximately 70% less then comparative receivers. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Don Martin

customer_reviews.title: Quality?
customer_reviews.text: Tested this indoors & it worked properly - took it outdoors and it refuses to work. Went back indoors thinking maybe there was an issue with too much light - still won't work....will be returning this item
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Dewalt DW071
customer_reviews.text: Had my doubts going in but the device works great. Already had the Dewalt DW701 rotary laser and a grade rod so this makes a perfect addition.
customer_reviews.author: Stumo

customer_reviews.title: It worked great with my Harbor Freight rotating laser level
customer_reviews.text: It worked great with my Harbor Freight rotating laser level. I had no problems getting this setup and working. The one flaw I had is that the battery isn't secure in the compartment, I had to wedge a piece of cardboard against the battery to put enough pressure to make the battery have solid contact with terminals. Once I did that it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: broschb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Super fast delivery and I used it today by doing 36x16 porch and it works perfect. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work. Manual useless.
customer_reviews.text: Would not indicate Laser received when first used. Manual had no troubleshooting information, or actual usage guidance. Amazon support could find none either.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Tape over beeper reduced loud beeper which is fine. On fine elevation setting it seems sensitive to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works with a harbor freight rotary laser. Used it to collect data for contour maps at ranges up to 120 ft. and am sure it will work farther. Tape over beeper reduced loud beeper which is fine. On fine elevation setting it seems sensitive to 1/32" to 1/16", on course 1/8" to 3/16" inch elevation sensitivity. Would have rated it 5, but I am still not young, beautiful or rich.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: When we purchased it we thought it was self leveling however it is not but works ok just wish it self leveled
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well even in bright sunlight
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I was afraid I would not be able to see my rotary laser I bright sunlight to be able to grade for a swimming pool. The detector works great in the brightest sun. It also made it easy for me to check grading without any helpers.
customer_reviews.author: Richard K

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Did what it was supposed to do with a RED laser. Not sure if it works on other colors. the sliding bar clip is a universal one so it needs a bit of TLC when installing it to the guide rule.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: Product works very well and is very.
customer_reviews.text: Product works very well and is very. Audible I only wish they came in a case to put them in but I’d definitely buy again and we’ll wor the price

customer_reviews.title: NOTHING BUT HAPPINESS!
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT A ROTATING LASER FROM HARBOR FREIGHT HAD A LOW POWER LASER THIS MADE IT USABLE IN DAYTIME. VERY ACCURATE, VERY LOUD! ATTACHED TO MY GRADE STICK PERFECTLY

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Overall disappointing - won’t read the later after about 20 feet in any sunlight. Might work better if it’s completely shaded but any sunlight made it ineffective after that distance.

customer_reviews.title: Only works with pulse (rotary) laser levels.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the product because it doesn't work with non-rotary (pulse) laser levels. I wish the specifications were more specific. So with that since I have to rate, I'll rate it in the middle.

customer_reviews.title: Good price and does the job well.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my broken Bosch unit with this. Good price and does it's job well.

product_meta.title: AdirPro LD-8 Universal Rotary Laser Receiver Detector with Rod Clamp
feature_bullets: DUAL-SIDED LCD DISPLAY. The AdirPro LD-8 is outfitted with a dual-sided LCD display for easy visual readout on both sides of the receiver. Boasting a working range of 100 feet, it displays clear and accurate readouts of the elevation, grade sensitivity, and audio and battery status.

EASY TO USE. Featuring a user-friendly interface, this unit is smart in its simple design. Both the volume and backlight can be adjusted with the simple touch of a button, while a magnetic strip allows you to affix the receiver onto any metal surface.

DURABLE CONSTRUCTION. The Rotary Laser Receiver Detector is expertly crafted with a hard plastic housing and rubber casing to provide long-lasting strength and use. These weather-resistant IP55 rated materials are designed to hold up against the elements, keeping the unit protected when working outdoors in wet conditions.

COMPATIBLE ROD MOUNTING BRACKET. You can easily secure the receiver to the clamp using the included ¼-inch thread screw, then clamp the receiver to a grade rod or wooden pole. The bolt adjustment system easily adjusts with a simple screwing motion to secure the clamp to the rod or pole.

LONG BATTERY LIFE. The AdirPro comes complete with two AA batteries, providing you with approximately 40 working hours. After approximately 10 minutes of being idle, the automatic shut-off feature will power down the device to extend battery life. **Prop 65 Warning - Lead and DEHP**

specifications.Special Features: IP55 Protection from dust ingress and low pressure water
specifications.Included Components: AdirPro LD-8 Universal Rotary Laser Receiver Detector with Rod Clamp
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars281 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
